"A.D.2028/4/23/15:00": "Hahahaha... Hahahahaha! The will of the people surpasses even I!"
"However, I won't lose! For the sake of those who walked alongside me... Until I fulfill my desire, I can't afford to... stop..."
"Gu... Uu... Uaaaaa!!"
"It's... that black shadow that appeared before! Why is it here?!"
"It's trying to... absorb Mother?"
"Did it choose to wait until Mother's strength was drained to attack?!"
"Stop it... you demonic spirit! I don't wish for destruction... All I... All I... wanted was..."
"Aru! Mother!"
"What... the hell... is that?"
"...<%me>. We've picked up a new reading."
"There's no mistaking it. This is the reading of a new Dark Falz."
"Did the Aru inside of Mother turn completely into a Dark Falz?!"
"It can't be..."
"Wait..."
"Big sis... <%me>..."
"Wh-?! Aru?! Is that you, Aru?!"
"I'm still here... and Mother is here with me now."
"Big sis, big sis. You can understand now, right big sis? Mother is suffering too."
"...Yes, I understand. Mother was lonely. She was alone for so long."
"I know exactly how she feels..."
"Big sis, <%me>. Please, save Mother. This is my final request..."
"Aru, don't go around saying crap like \"my final request\"!"
"I came here with the intent of saving everyone! That's my desire!"
"Save Aru, save Mother, and save the world as a result!"
"There's nothing more to it! That's it! Isn't that right, <%me>?"
"This power of mine is the power to save people! Just you wait! Aru! Mother!"
